<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="HO Product Performance League Table default">278faed57763011061b80bbc3c5a99c6</macroponent><name>showVerticalASupportingMetric1Chart</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var indicator = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalA.supportingMetrics[0].metricSysid;
    var breakdown = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalA.supportingMetrics[0].breakdownSysid;


    var datasources = [{
        "metrics": [{
            "dataSource": "datasourceID_VASM1",
            "id": "metricID_VASM1",
            "aggregateIndicator": "",
            "frequency": 10,
            "numberFormat": {
                "customFormat": false
            },
            "axisId": "primary"
        }],
        "datasources": [{
            "sourceType": "indicator",
            "uuid": {
                "indicator": indicator,
                "breakdowns": []
            },
            "id": "datasourceID_VASM1"
        }],
        "trendBy": {
            "trendByFrequency": "date",
            "trendByFields": [{
                "field": "anything",
                "metric": "metricID_VASM1"
            }]
        },
        "groupBy": [{
            "maxNumberOfGroups": 10,
            "numberOfGroupsBasedOn": "NO_OF_GROUP_BASED_ON_PER_METRIC",
            "showOthers": false,
            "hideZeroValues": false,
            "groupBy": [{
                "dataSource": "datasourceID_VASM1",
                "groupByField": breakdown,
                "isRange": false,
                "isPaBucket": false
            }]
        }]
    }];

    // var datasources = [...api.state.datasources];
    // datasources[0].uuid = {...datasources[0].uuid, indicator:indicator};
    api.setState("verticalASupportingMetric1", datasources);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-19 09:25:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>fce074fd77e3011061b80bbc3c5a99e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>showVerticalASupportingMetric1Chart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fce074fd77e3011061b80bbc3c5a99e0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-23 12:40:10</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>00000000</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fce074fd77e3011061b80bbc3c5a99e0</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-19 13:00:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>f5cbba8e1b3b751c64122144b24bcb80</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-19 13:00:15</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
